roleset.name: exact and reproducible

example.name: precise-j: arg0, EXT
example.text: In order to force China to foot the bill , the IMF repeatedly overturn its own previous estimates of China 's economic growth , adjusted from 9.0 percent down to 8.25 percent -LRB- but still being able to be precise to two hundredths , it 's really amazing -RRB- .

example.name: precise-j: both args
example.text: The Buddha was precise in his description of Right Speech

propbank.arg: in his description of Right Speech

example.name: precise-j: both args
example.text: An MRI in our case was precise in localizing the site and extent of fracture , which was reiterated by our surgical findings .

propbank.arg: in localizing the site and extent of fracture
which was reiterated by our surgical findings

example.name: precision-n: both args
example.text: The precision of the ultrasonic sounding in ice depth measurement .

roleset.note: PRECISE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from precise.01-j)
